content.rendered:
Directed by Kabir Khan

Written by Sumit Arora . Vasan Bala . Sanjay Puran Singh Chauhan . Sanjay Puran Singh Chauhan . Kabir Khan

Star Ranveer Singh (Kapil Dev). Deepika Padukone (Romi Dev). Tahir Raj Bhasin (Sunil Gavaskar). Jiiva (Krishnamachari Srikkanth). Saqib Saleem (Mohinder Amarnath). Pankaj Tripathi (PR. Man Singh). Chirag Patil (Sandeep Patil). Jatin Sarna (Yashpal Sharma). Harrdy Sandhu (Madan Lal). Nishant Dahiya (Roger Binny). Ammy Virk (Balwinder Singh Sandhu). Sahil Khattar (Syed Kirmani). Dinker Sharma (Kirti Azad). Addinath Kothare (Dilip Vengsarkar). Dhairya Karwa (Ravi Shastri). R. Badree (Sunil Valson). Boman Irani (Farokh Engineer). Satish Alekar (Sheshrao Wankhede). Jacques Taylor (Viv Richards). Mohinder Amarnath (Lala Amarnath). Neena Gupta (Raj Kumari Lajwanti (Kapil’s Mother)). Anjum Batra (Kulwant Singh Toor). Mali Marshall (Malcolm Marshall). Pete Picton (David Frith). Advait Adi (Young Indian fan). Jitendra Rai (Little boy’s father). Amer Patel (Srenik Sett). Jeetesh Gorasia (Jassi (dhol player)). Max Norman (Bob Willis). Dev Barot (Javed miandad). Ray Burnet (Barrie Meyers). Simon Balfour (David Frith). Marek Hollands (Patrick Eiger). Tony Richardson (Stephen Camacho). Harry Whittaker (Martin Snedden). Aditi Arya (Inderjit Mohinder Amarnath (Mrs. Amarnath)). Wamiqa Gabbi (Anu Madan Lal (Mrs. Madan Lal)). Parvati Nair (Pammi Sunil Gavaskar (Mrs. Gavaskar)). Amrita Puri (Vidya Srikkanth (Mrs. Srikkanth)). Samreen Kaur (Simran (Ballu’s Fiance)). Samantha Glendinning (Queen Elizabeth II). Avantika Akerkar (Indira Gandhi). Kapil Dev (Six Catching Spectator). Tagenarine Chanderpaul (Larry Gomes). Carl Greenidge (Gordon Greenidge). Jason Lolyd (Joel Garner). Rajiv Gupta (Journalist Mishra). Swetha Vinod (Kalyani (Tamil family – girl)). Rofique Khan (Kapil dev Fan). Rukhsar Rehman (Salma Sultan ( News reader)). Pawan Sahni (Indian Pub Boy). Neha Pushp (Indian Cricket Supporter / Jimmy Amarnath Fan). Dave Watts (David Shepherd). Suhita Thatte (Gavaskar’s Neighbor). Pushkaraj Chirputkar (Gavaskar’s Neighbor). Backagaindancer (Sastri). Luca Barbarossa (Policeman). Rene Costa (Reporter).Brijendra Kala . Rahul Khanna (Jawaan). Preeti Malhotra (Indian Cricket Supporter). Robin March (Guard (Lord’s)). Jess Mayo (Extra / Reporter). John McHale (England Cricket Supporter). Bharat Mistri (Sri Lanka Cricket Team Manager). John Neil Park (England Cricket Spectator). Hiten Patel (Ajay Kapoor). Pedramfaizi (Nader). Happy Sharma (Gill). David Shaw (Journalist). Freddie Simon (Kim Hughes). Palak Singh (Renuka). Samiran Singh (Junior).Neeraj Sood . Callum Stuart (Ken MacLeay). Jon Wennington (Cricket match commentator). Mark Jason Williams (Zac Tomkins)

Language Hindi. English

Producers Vivek b Agrawal. Jim Edgar. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Ghanteshwar T. Guru . Vishnuvardhan Induri. Md Anan Islam . Rajan Kapoor . Kabir Khan . Madhu Mantena Varma. Sajid Nadiadwala. Deepika Padukone. Cyrus Patel. Aditya Singh. Navmeet Singh. Sheetal Vinod Talwar

Production Reliance Entertainment. Phantom Films. Kabir Khan Films
